name: BOOOM
description:
First game jam, first upload, and first actual game. Didn't use the full 48 hours because work/school, but still wanted to submit!

I'd recommend playing this through git-pages, as it seems to handle loading and physics objects a bit better: https://nadivgold.github.io/miz-game-jam/

Knock enemies off your pillar with your power of self detonation. 

4 different enemy types

3 different power-ups

written with BabylonJS 

source code here
